Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.interfaces

Interface IExpenseService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExpenseService
@Service public interface IExpenseService
Service class for managing expenses.

  • Method Details

    • getExpenseById

      DtoExpenseQuery getExpenseById(Integer expenseId)
      Retrieves an expense by its ID.
      Parameters:
      expenseId - the ID of the expense
      Returns:
      the expense details

    • getExpenses

      List<DtoExpenseQuery> getExpenses(String expenseType, String category, String provider, String dateFrom, String dateTo)
      Retrieves a list of expenses based on the provided filters.
      Parameters:
      expenseType - the type of expense
      category - the category of the expense
      provider - the provider of the expense
      dateFrom - the start date for the expense search
      dateTo - the end date for the expense search
      Returns:
      a list of expenses matching the filters

    • postExpense

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DtoResponseExpense> postExpense(DtoRequestExpense request, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, Integer userId)
      Creates a new expense.
      Parameters:
      request - the expense request details
      file - the file associated with the expense
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      the response entity containing the created expense details

    • deteleExpense

      DtoResponseDeleteExpense deteleExpense(Integer id, Integer userId)
      Deletes an expense by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the expense to delete
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      the response entity containing the delete status

    • createCreditNoteForExpense

      DtoResponseExpense createCreditNoteForExpense(Integer id, Integer userId)
      Creates a credit note for an existing expense.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the expense
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      the response entity containing the credit note details

    • getExpenseByPaymentDateRange

      List<ExpenseModel> getExpenseByPaymentDateRange(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves a list of expenses within a specified payment date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the payment date range
      endDate - the end date of the payment date range
      Returns:
      a list of expenses within the specified date range

    • putExpense

      DtoResponseExpense putExpense(DtoRequestExpense request, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, Integer userId)
      Updates an existing expense.
      Parameters:
      request - the expense request details
      file - the file associated with the expense
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      the response entity containing the updated expense details
